Key Match Events: Kohli reaches his hundred with a six!
Kohli scores an unbeaten 103 off 97 balls, including 6x4 and 4x6
India won by 7 wickets with 51 balls remaining
Shubman Gill scores 50 off 52 balls, including 5x4 and 2x6
Rohit Sharma scores 37 not out off 33 balls
Jasprit Bumrah takes 3 wickets for 44 runs in 4 overs
Ravindra Jadeja takes 1 wicket for 1 run in 1 over
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya injured his ankle and had to leave the field early
Bangladesh's Shakib Al Hasan is ruled out due to a quadriceps injury
India won their previous three ODIs against Bangladesh, including at the Asia Cup
Bangladesh haven't played an ODI against India in India since 1998
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
India maintained their unbeaten World Cup record against Pakistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shubman Gill shakes off a fever to score a half-century
Rohit Sharma passes 250 runs for the tournament in the last three innings
Bangladesh's opening stand of 93 was broken by Shardul Thakur
